subject: ADMINISTRATIVE CHARGES
body:
Sir

What is going on sir, We are still waiting for the payment of us$1950 as
stated in the payment application, which will enable the central bank
accredited attorney sign off the funds and the final fund release order and
remittance effected to your designated bank account as approved by senate
committee on inheritance, this is only the  delay regarding your payment.
kindly make arrangement to send the payment via the account sent earlier or
via e-wallet thus

*bc1qjn04gut0akc9h7xgjs4p0vcq39paj8a3s4lz5j*

You can use  the above for the payment which  is cheaper, reliable and
faster: thus

You can reach me via my whatsap +234-80-52557352 for more briefing and
clarification else your payment will be reverted to treasury dept of
central bank as unclaimed payment, time is utmost important
Regards

Mike
